Footer.customMadeStrapsDescription: All straps on XiangleRatchetStrap.com are made to order. This gives you the ability to choose the length, colour, and other options that fit your needs.
Footer.copyright: © 2025 Xiangle Ratchet Strap. All rights reserved.

contactUs.addressValue: No. 18 Zhenxing Road, Yangshe Town, Zhangjiagang City, Suzhou, China, 215600

AboutUsPage.missionVision: At Xiangle Ratchet Strap, our mission and vision are intertwined: to empower small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs) worldwide by providing dependable, high-performance, and safe tie-down solutions that ensure efficiency and peace of mind. We are committed to offering high-quality, competitively priced, and highly customised one-stop cargo control solutions, fostering a strong partnership that enables us to grow together with our customers and contribute to their success in confidently securing their shipments, structures, and projects.

factoryEstablished.name: Factory Established
factoryEstablished.description: Our journey began in 2006 with the founding of our manufacturing facility, laying the foundation for years of growth and innovation in tie-down strap production.

enteredInternationalTrade.name: Entered International Trade
enteredInternationalTrade.description: In 2016, we expanded into global markets, launching our export business and building long-term partnerships with clients around the world.

scaledTo100Workers.name: Scaled to 100 Workers, $5M Output
scaledTo100Workers.description: By 2023, our workforce reached 100 employees and our annual production value surpassed $5 million, marking a major milestone in our capacity and capabilities.

newProductInnovation.name: New Product Innovation
newProductInnovation.description: In 2024, we launched our newly developed automatic retractable ratchet strap and increased our annual production value to $7 million.

engineeringCapabilities.heading: Engineering & OEM Capabilities
engineeringCapabilities.description: Innovation lies at the core of what we do. From custom length straps to fully branded solutions, Xiangle provides full OEM/ODM services tailored to your market needs. Our in-house development team is continuously exploring new materials, user-friendly designs, and cost-effective improvements—bringing your product ideas to life, with factory-level control and quality assurance.

ourStrength.heading: Our Strength
ourStrength.description: Xiangle Ratchet Strap operates with a strong manufacturing backbone, powered by a skilled workforce, automated production lines, and a commitment to continuous improvement. Our factory integrates advanced equipment, rigorous quality control systems (e.g., adhering to AS/NZS 4380 where applicable), and a scalable production capacity to meet both high-volume orders and custom requirements. Whether it’s precision-welded buckles or next-generation retractable systems, we focus on delivering consistent performance with every strap produced.

globalReach.heading: Global Reach
globalReach.description: Since entering the international market in 2016, Xiangle's products have been shipped to customers across North America, Europe, Southeast Asia, and Australia. Backed by a robust inventory system and responsive logistics team, we ensure timely delivery and reliable supply for partners worldwide—whether you're a distributor, e-commerce brand, or industrial end user.

imageAlts.scaleCapacity: Image showing factory scale and capacity
imageAlts.precisionSkill: Image showcasing precision and skill in manufacturing
imageAlts.gsCertificated: GS certification logo or image (relevant for some markets)
imageAlts.testedQuality: Image representing tested quality of products, meeting relevant standards like AS/NZS 4380
imageAlts.globalReachMap: Map illustrating global reach of Xiangle products

ContactSection.title: We Work For You
ContactSection.description: We take customer service very seriously and pride ourselves on having the best customer service in the industry. Our team will work tirelessly to ensure you are getting the high-quality products you need, and the exceptional service you deserve. You will always speak with a real, live person and will never have to wait for more than 1 business day to hear back. We've got your back!

LogoClouds.title: Our Customers Love Us
LogoClouds.description: From the very first use, they notice the difference — the reliable quality, thoughtful design, and unwavering service. Every purchase is a vote of confidence, and we're committed to honouring that trust by perfecting every detail. Thank you for being part of our journey. Because of you, we keep getting better.

hero.title: EQUIPMENT YOU NEED. SERVICE YOU DESERVE.
hero.subtitle: YOUR PREFERRED VENDOR OF HIGH-QUALITY TRUCKING, RIGGING & LIFTING, AND MOVING EQUIPMENT.

section.title: SMALL COMPANY FEEL WITH HIGH-TOUCH SERVICE, BACKED BY A LARGE COMPANY OPERATION.
section.description: Xiangle Ratchet Strap is not your average equipment supplier. We don't just want to work for you, we want to work with you. Our dedicated team of experts is what sets us apart - ensuring you get the high-quality equipment you need and the exceptional service you deserve. With custom product capabilities, fast delivery, and financing available, we look forward to keeping you moving forward.

StatsSection.title: Reliable Manufacturing, Proven Excellence
StatsSection.description: We are committed to providing high-quality products, reliable service, and seamless fulfilment. With years of expertise and a strong global network, we ensure efficiency, precision, and customer satisfaction in every order.

manufacturing.subtitle: Manufacturing
manufacturing.title: Factory-Direct Production
manufacturing.imageAlt: Factory production line for tie-down straps
manufacturing.description: As a manufacturer, we oversee the entire production process, ensuring strict quality control and cost efficiency. Our advanced facility in China produces high-quality tie-down straps, cargo nets, and lifting slings tailored to your needs.

speed.subtitle: Speed
speed.title: Fast & Reliable Delivery
speed.imageAlt: Fast delivery truck speeding on a highway
speed.description: With an optimised production line and a robust logistics network, we ensure quick order fulfilment. Bulk orders are processed efficiently, and we offer flexible shipping solutions to meet global demand.

customization.subtitle: Customisation
customization.title: Tailored to Your Needs
customization.description: Every business is unique, and so are its requirements. We offer fully customisable products, including size, material, and branding options, to match your exact specifications.

expertise.subtitle: Expertise
expertise.title: Industry-Leading Team
expertise.imageAlt: Team of experts discussing product design
expertise.description: Our experienced professionals are dedicated to providing top-notch solutions. From product recommendations to technical support, we ensure you get the best products for your business.

partnership.subtitle: Partnership
partnership.title: Long-Term Business Support
partnership.imageAlt: Large warehouse storage centre indicating partnership support
partnership.description: We are more than just a supplier—we are your manufacturing partner. With competitive pricing, bulk order flexibility, and expert guidance, we help you scale your business efficiently.

TeamSection.title: Meet Our Leadership
TeamSection.description: We are a team of experienced professionals, committed to driving excellence in manufacturing and providing top-quality solutions for our business partners.

steven.bio: Responsible for product development, Steven is a visionary leader and co-founder of Xiangle. Outside of work, he cherishes his role as the father of two daughters and two playful cats.

sophia.bio: As Sales Manager and co-founder of Xiangle, Sophia brings extensive experience in building strong customer relationships and leading the sales team to success. At home, she is the loving mother of two daughters and two adorable cats.

dustin.bio: Leading the foreign trade team, Dustin is also responsible for foreign trade business operations and market development at Xiangle. He has been a valuable member for 5 years, consistently supporting sales initiatives and fostering team collaboration.

warren.bio: With 9 years of dedicated service in foreign trade sales at Xiangle, Warren possesses a deep understanding of international markets and excels at building lasting partnerships. In his free time, he enjoys playing basketball.

alex.bio: Alex has been a key player in foreign trade sales for a decade, leveraging his extensive experience to navigate global markets and achieve remarkable results.

chloe.bio: Chloe brings 5 years of experience in foreign trade sales to the Xiangle team, demonstrating a strong commitment to client satisfaction and driving international business growth.

metadata.title: FAQ - Xiangle Ratchet Strap
metadata.description: Frequently Asked Questions about our products and services. Find answers to common enquiries regarding ratchet straps, tie-downs, and more.

content.introText: There's a lot to know about webbing and straps! Here are some of the most common questions:
content.notFoundText: Didn't find the answer you're looking for? We'd be glad to clear things up! Check out our <contactLink>Contact Us Page</contactLink> to send us a message. Thank you!

ProductsPage.mainSubtitle: Browse our product categories to find the right professional equipment and solutions for your needs.

introduction.title: Professional Industrial Equipment and Solutions
introduction.paragraph: We are dedicated to providing high-quality equipment and solutions for the industrial and transportation industries. Whether you need industrial chains, protective equipment, or industrial belts, we have the right products for you. Our products are carefully selected to ensure performance and quality standards (e.g., AS/NZS 4380 where applicable) are met.

noResults.title: No products found
noResults.suggestion: Please try adjusting the filters or check back later.

CapabilitiesSection.imageAlt: Illustration showcasing Xiangle Ratchet Strap's unique capabilities and strengths
CapabilitiesSection.mainTitle: What Sets Xiangle Ratchet Strap Apart?
CapabilitiesSection.subTitle: Our Strengths

innovation.title: Continuous Innovation
innovation.description: At Xiangle Ratchet Strap, product innovation never stops. Our dedicated R&D team consistently develops new ratchet strap and tie-down solutions to meet the evolving needs of industries worldwide. From enhanced safety designs to multi-purpose buckle systems, we are always pushing boundaries to deliver better performance, greater versatility, and smarter utility.

inventorySupply.title: Global Inventory & Rapid Supply
inventorySupply.description: Backed by massive ready-to-ship inventory and a global logistics network, Xiangle Ratchet Strap ensures fast and efficient product delivery wherever you are. Whether you need a standard ratchet strap or a complex tie-down configuration, our supply chain is optimised to keep your operations moving—on time, every time.

moqCustomization.title: Low MOQ & Fully Custom Solutions
moqCustomization.description: We understand the importance of flexibility. That’s why Xiangle Ratchet Strap offers low minimum order quantities and tailored manufacturing to meet your specific project needs. From custom colours and lengths to private labelling and packaging, we help small businesses and large enterprises alike create exclusive solutions without the high volume barrier.

ratchetStrapsAndTieDowns.title: Ratchet Straps & Tie Downs
ratchetStrapsAndTieDowns.alt: Various ratchet straps and tie downs

kayakAndCanoeStrap.title: Kayak & Canoe Straps
kayakAndCanoeStrap.alt: Durable kayak and canoe tie down strap

atvAndMotorcycleStrap.title: ATV & Motorcycle Straps
atvAndMotorcycleStrap.alt: Secure ATV and motorcycle transport straps

retractable1Inch.title: 1" x 10' Retractable Ratchet Strap with S Hook
retractable1Inch.description: Effortless retraction and secure hold—engineered for fast, tangle-free cargo control in industrial settings.
retractable1Inch.beforeAlt: Cleanly organised retractable ratchet strap in use

stainlessSteel1Inch.title: 1" 316 Grade Stainless Steel Ratchet Strap with Double J Hook
stainlessSteel1Inch.description: Designed for marine and heavy-duty outdoor use, this corrosion-resistant tie-down strap offers long-lasting performance in harsh environments. Ideal for boats, trailers, and industrial applications.
stainlessSteel1Inch.beforeAlt: Shiny new 316 stainless steel ratchet strap
